name: Endless Worlds ◊
description:
Welcome to

Follow Eve's journey in the groundbreaking MMORPG Virtual Reality game

A world of war and machines

A world of swords and magic

A world of death and destruction

A world of supernatural beings

A world of gadgets and gizmos

Anything you can think of exists here.  Whether you wish to Play, Fight, Kill, Loot, Earn, Build, Help, Battle, Protect, Learn, Meet, you can achieve what you so desire in

(A text-based choose your own adventure game) IN-DEVELOPMENT
